name: Richard LOPEZ, et al., petitioners, v. ESTATE OF James Franklin PERRY, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Richard LOPEZ, et al., petitioners,
v.
ESTATE OF James Franklin PERRY, et al.
attorneys: Motion of International Municipal Lawyers Association for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit denied.
casebody.head_matter:
Richard LOPEZ, et al., petitioners,
v.
ESTATE OF James Franklin PERRY, et al.
No. 17-890.
Supreme Court of the United States
April 2, 2018.
Motion of International Municipal Lawyers Association for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit denied.
